text: Ara tini'i se'ijana yini akasa theke namana brsti, takhana tara dbara amara udâ€Œgata kari saba rakamera cara gacha, tarapara ta theke udagama kari sabuja gachapala, ya theke udbhaba kari thoka thoka sasya, ara khejura gacha theke -- tara mathi theke jhulanta kamdi, ara angurera o jalapa'iyera o dalimera bagana -- eka rakamera o samasyabihina. Tomara takiye dekho tara phalera dike yakhana ta phalabana haya o tara peke othate. Nihsandeha egulote rayeche nidarsanabali temana lokera jan'ya yara bisbasa sthapana kare.
